title: "Engineered virus and goggles restore object recognition in a blind man"
excerpt: "In an important proof of concept, researchers have now used a light-sensitive channel and some specialized goggles to allow someone who is otherwise blind to locate objects. The person who volunteered for the study suffers from retinitis pigmentosa,"
